sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) Once per round on the character's turn, the character may perform a Defensive Stance maneuver to defend against incoming melee attacks. He then suffers a number of strain no greater than his ranks in Defensive Stance. Until the start of the character's next turn, upgrade the difficulty of all melee combat checks targeting the character a number of times equal to the strain suffered by the character in this way.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Defensive stance</name> <number>TAL0001028</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 22:10:09</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0ae19f60dbea0c542901de90cf9619f0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 22:10:09</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
